THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: No major mismatches; the thumbnail captures the essence of the title, focusing on a dramatic, challenging moment (fifth day out of seven). The visual exaggeration (unclean, heavily padded cell) increases drama but matches expected YouTube stylization.
